Name: Visionarium
About the game: Visionarium is a visionary music driven VR journey partly created in Tilt Brush. In this experience a visionary trance state is simulated. The Oculus Touch controllers lets you paint beautiful and spectacular particle streams while your floating from one dimension to another in this immersive experience. Guided by a soundtrack from one of the best Psy Dub artists on the planet: Kalya Scintilla. Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
Meta Title: Visionarium: Jan 3, 2019, Sander Bos and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Visionarium? Check out the release date (Jan 3, 2019), developer insights from Sander Bos, and a complete game summary.
